import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function moneyFormatter(num){var p=num.toFixed(2).split('.');return'$ '+p[0].split('').reverse().reduce(function(acc,num,i,orig){return num==='-'?acc:num+(i&&!(i%3)?',':'')+acc;},'')+'.'+p[1];}export var IncomeExpenses=function IncomeExpenses(){var _useContext=useContext(GlobalContext),transactions=_useContext.transactions;var amounts=transactions.map(function(transaction){return transaction.amount;});var income=amounts.filter(function(item){return item>0;}).reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+=item;},0);var expense=amounts.filter(function(item){return item<0;}).reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+=item;},0)*-1;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inc-exp-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Income"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"money plus",children:["$",numberWithCommas(income)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Expense"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"money minus",children:["$",numberWithCommas(expense)]})]})]});};
